title: Angel in My Heart, Devil in My Soul
description: An Angel ignites passion in his heart but can this black Soul ever really love her?John Monroe had done unspeakable evil in his miserable life. He thought nothing of the order to kill this woman until his eyes feasted on her beauty. He was stunned by his reaction to her.Rachael dared to dream of a love, nothing could stop. She had to find out if the man in her dreams was real. She would learn to control her strange powers. Sensing evil with her five senses was a curse she lived with until she fell and lost her memory and her heart.
author: Linda D. Hays-Gibbs
